name: Class MultiTextUI
text:
A multiplexing UI used to combine TextUIs.

 This file was automatically generated by AutoMulti.

fields.description:
The vector containing the real UIs.  This is populated
 in the call to createUI, and can be obtained by calling
 the getUIs method.  The first element is guaranteed to be the real UI
 obtained from the default look and feel.

methods.method_sig: public ComponentUI[] getUIs()
methods.description:
Returns the list of UIs associated with this multiplexing UI.  This
 allows processing of the UIs by an application aware of multiplexing
 UIs on components.

methods.method_sig: public static ComponentUI createUI (JComponent a)
methods.description:
Returns a multiplexing UI instance if any of the auxiliary
 LookAndFeels supports this UI.  Otherwise, just returns the
 UI object obtained from the default LookAndFeel.
